line.text: So shall I live supposing thou art true
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Like a deceived husband so love face
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: May still seem love to me though altered new
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thy looks with me thy heart in other place
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: For there can live no hatred in thine eye
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Therefore in that I cannot know thy change
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: In many looks the false heart history
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Is writ in moods and frowns and wrinkles strange
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But heaven in thy creation did decree
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That in thy face sweet love should ever dwell
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Whateer thy thoughts or thy heart workings be
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thy looks should nothing thence but sweetness tell
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: How like Eve apple doth thy beauty grow
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: If thy sweet virtue answer not thy show
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
